content:
FILE_WRITTEN:config/intake_checklist.template.json
DIR_STATE:["config/claim_card.schema.json", "config/claim_card.schema.yaml", "config/claim_card_schema.json", "config/intake_checklist.schema.json", "config/intake_checklist.template.json", "config/intake_checklist.yaml", "config/qa_gates.yaml", "config/search_plan_template_2019_2025.yaml"]
SUMMARY:Updated the intake checklist template to explicitly require dataset name + DOI/link for dataset-verification pilot claims and to warn that research-area-only submissions will be blocked.
